item.title: 因美国大选猜测而进行的交易进入超速状态
item.description: 在美国大选前一周，华尔街正忙于分析下一任总统对市场的影响。投资手册被翻了个底朝天，从陷入僵局的国会到关税对通胀的影响，等等，无所不包。【原文：A week before the US election, Wall Street is falling over itself trying to suss out what the next president means for markets. Investment playbooks are being dusted off, gaming out everything from a gridlocked Congress to the impact of tariffs on inflation, and more.】

item.title: S.非洲反垄断机构阻止沃达康 7.45 亿美元光纤交易
item.description: 南非反垄断法庭禁止沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）以 132 亿兰特（7.45 亿美元）收购 Remgro 有限公司光纤业务股份的交易。【原文：South Africa’s antitrust tribunal prohibited Vodacom Group Ltd.’s 13.2 billion-rand ($745 million) deal to buy a stake in Remgro Ltd.’s fiber businesses.】

item.title: 英国 "即买即付 "金融科技公司向资产抵押贷款市场迈出一步
item.description: Zilch Technology Ltd. 的首席财务官表示，在扩大现有债务交易并引入新投资者后，这家 "现购现付 "贷款公司距离发行首只公开评级的资产支持证券又近了一步。【原文：Zilch Technology Ltd.’s chief financial officer says the buy-now-pay-later lender is one step closer to issuing its first publicly-rated asset-backed security after expanding an existing debt deal and bringing on new investors.】

item.title: 阿达尼旗舰公司利润跃升 663%，得益于机场，新能源
item.description: 由于机场和新能源部门的强劲表现抵消了煤炭贸易业务的拖累，阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd. ）公布的季度利润激增近八倍。股价上涨。【原文：Adani Enterprises Ltd. posted a nearly eight-fold surge in quarterly profit, as a strong show by airports and new energy units offset the drag from coal trading business. Shares rose.】

item.title: 夏季暴跌后诺和诺德股价有望超越礼来股价
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）今年在肥胖症药物股市大赢家的竞争中落后于礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.分析师预计这家丹麦公司将开始迎头赶上。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S has fallen behind Eli Lilly & Co. this year in the race to be the big stock market winner from obesity drugs. Analysts expect the Danish company to start catching up.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气期权看涨预示供应担忧挥之不去
item.description: 天然气期权表明，即使与中东有关的担忧已经消退，欧洲交易商仍认为价格有上行风险。【原文：Natural gas options are signaling European traders still see upside risk for prices, even after concerns linked to the Middle East have receded.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯寻求更多全球投资以推动化工发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正寻求增加对世界各地将石油转化为化学品的项目的投资，因为它希望为其原油锁定买家。【原文：Saudi Arabia is seeking to invest more in projects around the world that turn oil into chemicals as it looks to lock in buyers for its crude.】

item.title: 私募股权公司重启支票簿，在美国大举进行 850 亿美元交易
item.description: 私募股权公司又开始斥巨资寻找美国上市公司。【原文：Private equity firms are back to spending big in their hunt for public US companies.】

item.title: 维旺迪拆分后，雅尼克-博洛雷成为最大分拆公司的董事长
item.description: 法国亿万富翁文森特-博洛雷（Vincent Bolloré）的儿子亚尼克-博洛雷（Yannick Bolloré）将在今年晚些时候法国媒体集团维旺迪公司（Vivendi SE）分拆时担任该公司四个部门中三个部门的董事长。【原文：Yannick Bolloré, French billionaire Vincent Bolloré’s son, will be chairman of three of Vivendi SE’s four units when the French media conglomerate is split later this year.】

item.title: 石油疲软和经济放缓导致中石油利润下滑
item.description: 由于全球油价下跌和国内经济持续疲软，中国石油天然气股份有限公司第三季度利润下降。【原文：PetroChina Co.’s profit fell in the third quarter amid lower global oil prices and continued weakness in the domestic economy.】

item.title: 纳米比亚石油公司旨在增加未来在项目中的股份
item.description: 纳米比亚国家石油公司（National Petroleum Corp. of Namibia）的目标是将其在未来石油和天然气项目中的股份增加两倍，达到 30%，因为在多次近海发现石油和天然气之后，这个非洲南部国家的石油和天然气开采活动将激增。【原文：The National Petroleum Corp. of Namibia aims to triple its stake in future oil and gas projects to 30% as the southern African nation is set for a surge in activity following multiple offshore discoveries.】

item.title: Citadel的肯-格里芬预计特朗普将在美国大选中获胜
item.description: 金融家肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）预计，白宫选战将十分激烈，但唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将最终获胜。【原文：Financier Ken Griffin expects the race to the White House will be close, but Donald Trump will ultimately win.】

item.title: 欧拉电动汽车因财务困境股价跌破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 印度最大的电动摩托车制造商 Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的股价跌破了其首次公开募股的发行价，这对印度今年最受瞩目的上市企业之一来说是一次残酷的现实检验。【原文：Shares of India’s biggest e-scooter maker Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. fell below their initial public offering price, in a harsh reality check for one of the country’s most hyped listings of the year.】

item.title: 印度顶级汽车制造商因需求低迷利润下滑
item.description: 马鲁蒂铃木印度有限公司（Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. ）公布的利润低于预期，原因是这个世界上人口最多的国家的汽车消费需求依然疲软。股价下跌。【原文：Maruti Suzuki India Ltd. reported lower-than-expected profit as consumer demand for cars remained weak in the world’s most-populous nation. Shares fell.】

item.title: 沙特国际投资基金（PIF）总裁谈沙特关注国内事务和推动人工智能发展
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯近 1 万亿美元的公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）总裁为第八届 "未来投资倡议"（Future Investment Initiative）揭幕，强调了沙特阿拉伯王国对国内投资的重视以及对人工智能的推动。【原文：The governor of Saudi Arabia’s nearly $1 trillion Public Investment Fund kicked off the eighth edition of Future Investment Initiative highlighting the kingdom’s focus on domestic investments and a push into artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 金多斯称，在银行合并问题上，欧洲方法优于本国方法
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯强调了欧洲银行业整合的优点。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos highlighted the virtues of European banking consolidation.】

item.title: 英国石油公司在利润下降、债务增加的情况下仍坚持回购股票
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在油价疲软给公司资产负债表带来压力的情况下，仍保持了 17.5 亿美元的季度回购步伐。【原文：BP Plc maintained its pace of its quarterly buybacks at $1.75 billion even as weak oil prices put pressure on the company’s balance sheet.】

item.title: 汇丰欧洲离职高管加入 Serendipity Capital 董事会
item.description: 科林-贝尔（Colin Bell）将于今年年底卸任汇丰控股有限公司欧洲业务主管一职，并将加入新加坡投资公司 Serendipity Capital 董事会。【原文：Colin Bell, who is stepping down from running HSBC Holdings Plc’s European operations at the end of the year, will join the board of Singapore-based investment firm Serendipity Capital.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市蓄势待发，汇丰银行宣布回购
谷歌支持的 Moniepoint 通过股权出售融资 1.1 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚现金转移初创企业 Moniepoint 表示，它通过股权出售筹集了 1.1 亿美元。【原文：Moniepoint, a Nigerian cash-transfer startup, said it raised $110 million in an equity sale.】

item.title: 投资者涌入市场，大和银行利润激增逾 80
item.description: 大和证券集团公司的利润激增，原因是投资者对股市的兴趣增加，财富和资产管理的收益推动了业绩的增长。【原文：Daiwa Securities Group Inc.’s profit surged as gains from wealth and asset management drove performance on the back of increased investor interest in the stock market.】

item.title: 福特斯库称铁矿石观察家误判了迫在眉睫的供应困境
item.description: Fortescue Ltd.表示，铁矿石市场可能误判了这种关键炼钢原料的基本面，原因是随着现有矿山产量的减少，增加总体供应量将面临障碍。【原文：Fortescue Ltd. said the iron ore market may have misjudged fundamentals for the key steelmaking ingredient due to the hurdles involved in ramping up overall supplies, as output from existing mines wanes.】

item.title: 台风 "天兔 "将掠过菲律宾，向台湾移动
item.description: 热带气旋 "孔-雷 "已增强为台风，有可能给菲律宾北部带来强风和暴雨，然后向台湾追踪并登陆。【原文：Tropical Cyclone Kong-Rey has intensified into a typhoon and is threatening to bring strong winds and torrential rain to the northern Philippines, before tracking toward Taiwan and making landfall.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行贷款收入保持增长，利润超出预期
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）第三季度利润好于预期，因为该银行的利息收入持续增长，手续费收入也在增加。【原文：Banco Santander SA posted better-than-expected profit in the third quarter, as the lender saw continued growth in interest income and rising revenue from fees.】

item.title: 汇丰银行奖金池有望追平去年的十年最高纪录
item.description: 汇丰控股公司的银行家们有望分享到 2024 年的奖金池，其价值至少相当于去年的约 38 亿美元。【原文：Bankers at HSBC Holdings Plc can expect to share a bonus pool for 2024 worth at least as much as last year’s haul of about $3.8 billion.】

item.title: 高盛所罗门 "担忧 "中东冲突扩大
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Chief Executive David Solomon expressed concern about the widening conflict in the Middle East even though it hasn’t had a significant impact on business yet.】

item.title: 新加坡淡马锡称特朗普胜选将拖累全球经济增长
item.description: 新加坡国有投资公司警告说，唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选不一定对世界经济和金融市场有利。【原文：Singapore’s state-owned investment firm is warning that a Donald Trump election victory might not necessarily be a plus for the world economy and financial markets.】

item.title: 亿万富翁卢的卓越投资公司因服装销售大涨
item.description: 在所罗门-卢的 Premier Investments Ltd. 同意将旗下服装品牌出售给迈尔控股有限公司（Myer Holdings Ltd. ）后，该公司股价飙升，这笔交易巩固了这位亿万富翁在澳大利亚零售业的主导地位。【原文：Shares of Solomon Lew’s Premier Investments Ltd. soared after the company agreed to sell its apparel brands to Myer Holdings Ltd. in a deal that cements the billionaire’s dominance across Australian retail.】

item.title: 高盛所罗门对交易前景持乐观态度
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s top executive sounded a bullish note on the outlook for dealmaking, singling out investments in technology as a bright spot.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 FII8：高盛所罗门对交易前景持乐观态度
item.description:
【原文：

   

】
